name: Lesotho
introduction: Combien de codes a tu fais?
hateHello: oh.., toi, dis moi ce que tu veux.
tradeRequest: Vous avez apparement un peu d'interêt pour moi
uniques: No Maintenance costs for improvements in [All] tiles
When defeating a [All] unit, earn [10] Gold and recruit it
City-State territory always counts as friendly territory
All newly-trained [All] units [in all cities] receive the [Losotho Ability] promotion
Military Units gifted from City-States start with [10000] XP
New [All] units start with [10000] Experience [in all cities]
Enables conversion of city production to gold
[-100]% maintenance cost for buildings [in all cities]
[-100]% Culture cost of adopting new Policies
May not generate great prophet equivalents naturally
May buy [All] buildings for [0] [Culture] [in all cities]
May buy [All] units for [0] [Culture] [in all cities]
[99999] Happiness from each type of luxury resource
[+10 Science, +10 Food, +10 Gold, +10 Production, +10 Culture, +10 Faith, +10 Happiness] from every specialist [in all cities]
[+10 Science, +10 Food, +10 Gold, +10 Production, +10 Culture, +10 Faith, +10 Happiness] from [All] tiles [in all cities]
Resting point for Influence with City-States is increased by [99999]
Cities are razed [99999] times as fast
Influence of all other civilizations with all city-states degrades [99999]% faster
Gifts of Gold to City-States generate [99999]% more Influence
Quantity of strategic resources produced by the empire +[99999]%
Religion naturally spreads to cities [+99999] tiles away
Units fight as though they were at full strength even when damaged
"Borrows" city names from other civilizations in the game
Can spend Gold to annex or puppet a City-State that has been your ally for [1] turns.
Can embark and move over Coasts and Oceans immediately
May choose [6] additional belief(s) of any type when [founding] a religion
May choose [6] additional belief(s) of any type when [enhancing] a religion
Land units may cross [Mountain] tiles after the first [Worker] is earned
Units ending their turn on [Mountain] tiles take [0] damage
